translation.en: Ball one to Johnny Damon and we are under way.
translation.ja: ジョニー･デーモン １ボール

translation.en: Damon has eight hits in 18 at bats... ...a double, a triple, a couple of stolen bases.
translation.ja: 彼は18打数８安打 ２塁打１ ３塁打１ 盗塁２

translation.en: He had four hits in the series opener.
translation.ja: 開幕戦だけで４安打です

translation.en: Down the right-field line, fair off the bat of Damon. It rolls by Spencer.
translation.ja: デーモン ライト線に打った スペンサーが追う

translation.en: And Damon will coast into second base with a leadoff double.
translation.ja: デーモン ２塁へ… ア･リーグ地区優勝決定戦

translation.en: Into right-center field, broken bat, it'll fall, a base hit.
translation.ja: センター右　バットが折れた ヒットです

translation.en: They wave around Damon. He will score.
translation.ja: デーモンが回る

translation.en: And Jason Giambi delivers... ...with a run-scoring single here in the opening inning.
translation.ja: ジェイソン･ジオンビ 初回から１打点

translation.en: And the Athletics have taken that 1-nothing lead.
translation.ja: アスレチックス１点先行

translation.en: Go, come on, now. We gotta spin it.
translation.ja: いいぞ　行け！

translation.en: Bases loaded. The Yankees have the tying run at second, down 2-nothing.
translation.ja: ヤンキース 満塁です ２人戻れば同点　現在０対２

translation.en: The A's are kicking it and throwing it all over the field.
translation.ja: アスレチックス 守備が乱れた

translation.en: And it might lead to their elimination if they don't get it right in a hurry.
translation.ja: このままでは地区優勝は 危ない

translation.en: Hammered down the right-field line. Justice!
translation.ja: ライトへ大きな飛球 ジャスティス

translation.en: The Yankees have taken the lead.
translation.ja: ヤンキース　リード

translation.en: They're standing, anticipating another trip...
translation.ja: 期待がふくらみます

translation.en: ...to the League Championship Series.
translation.ja: リーグ優勝決定戦へ 進めるか

translation.en: The Yankees one out away.
translation.ja: ヤンキース 勝利まで１アウト

translation.en: Eric Byrnes, never with an at bat in Yankee Stadium...
translation.ja: エリック･バーンズ ヤンキースタジアムでは いまだ安打なし

translation.en: ...and they don't get much bigger than this one.
translation.ja: ヤンキースタジアムでは いまだ安打なし

translation.en: Or more hectic when you're up there trying to get a job done.
translation.ja: この大事な勝負に勝てるか

translation.en: And they're a strike away.
translation.ja: ２ストライク…

translation.en: And they're roaring in the Bronx.
translation.ja: ブロンクス大興奮

translation.en: Losing the first two games at home in the best-of-five series...
translation.ja: ホームで初戦２試合を 失いましたが―

translation.en: ...and roar back to--
translation.ja: あと一歩で地区優勝

translation.en: The Yankees will defend their title.
translation.ja: ヤンキース リーグ優勝決定戦に進出

translation.en: It's okay, Joe, you can leave it on.
translation.ja: ジョー　消さなくていい

translation.en: -I don't need to watch. -Joe, leave it on.
translation.ja: つけておけ

translation.en: Imagine how bad it'd be if you were a Yankee player...
translation.ja: 〝イズリングハウゼン ジオンビ　デーモン〞 〝イズリングハウゼン ジオンビ　デーモン〞 シャンパン嫌いには ヤンキース選手は務まらない

translation.en: ...and didn't like the taste of champagne.
translation.ja: 〝イズリングハウゼン ジオンビ　デーモン〞 シャンパン嫌いには ヤンキース選手は務まらない

translation.en: You know how many kids are wearing Giambi's--?
translation.ja: アスレチックスの ジオンビは―

translation.en: You know, Oakland Giambi's jerseys and hats and pictures and posters?
translation.ja: 子供たちに大人気 皆 彼の写真を…

translation.en: Those same kids will be booing in July when the Yankees come here.
translation.ja: ヤンキースに移ったら ブーイングだね

translation.en: Is it Giambi that's stabbing the back or the Pinstripes on the East Coast?
translation.ja: 悪いのはジオンビか “ピンストライプ(ヤンキース)”か

translation.en: You can't blame them for pilfering the henhouse.
translation.ja: 引き抜きは文句言えないよ

translation.en: -The henhouse is there. -I can't blame them?
translation.ja: 引き抜きは文句言えないよ 文句はある

translation.en: They're offering $120 million over six years.
translation.ja: オファーは ６年で １億2000万ドル

translation.en: The Yankees have deeper pockets and they're willing to give him money.
translation.ja: ヤンキースは好きなだけ 金を出せる

translation.en: They're pilfering our players. It's like we're a farm system for the New York Yankees.
translation.ja: こっちは選手を育てる ファームみたいなもんだ

translation.en: -How are the guys doing? -That was a killer.
translation.ja: 選手たちは？ みんな 相当ヘコんでます

translation.en: That was a killer. It's a tough one to swallow. It's....
translation.ja: みんな 相当ヘコんでます

translation.en: -They played great. -They played their hearts out.
translation.ja: 頑張った 精一杯やった

translation.en: They did. They played fantastic. It just didn't fall our way.
translation.ja: よくやったが 結果が出なかった

translation.en: -You'll do better next year. -But we were close, though.
translation.ja: 来年がある あと一歩でした

translation.en: -We were so close. -Right there.
translation.ja: 惜しかった もうちょい

translation.en: Almost had it. You gotta feel good about that.
translation.ja: 自信を持っていい

translation.en: I feel great about it. I feel great about it.
translation.ja: 誇りに思ってます

translation.en: We're not gonna do better next year.
translation.ja: 来年はもっと厳しい

translation.en: -Why not? -Well, you know we're being gutted.
translation.ja: 何で？ 骨を抜かれた

translation.en: We're losing Giambi, Damon, Isringhausen.
translation.ja: ジオンビ　デーモン イズリングハウゼン

translation.en: Done deal. We're in trouble.
translation.ja: 移籍する　終わりです

translation.en: You'll find new guys. You found Jason, you found Damon.
translation.ja: また探せばいい ジオンビたちのように

translation.en: -I need more money, Steve. -Billy.
translation.ja: 金が要る

translation.en: -I need more money. -We don't have any.
translation.ja: もっと金が

translation.en: I can't compete against $120 million with $38 million.
translation.ja: 3800万と１億2000万では 違いすぎる

translation.en: We're not gonna compete with these teams that have big budgets.
translation.ja: 金持ちチームと 競争する気はない

translation.en: We're gonna work within the constraints we have...
translation.ja: 我々は制約の中で戦う

translation.en: ...and you're gonna do the best job that you can recruiting new players.
translation.ja: 君はその中で 最高の新人を発掘しろ

translation.en: We're not gonna pay $17 million to players.
translation.ja: 年俸1700万ドルも払えない

translation.en: I'm not asking you...
translation.ja: そんな金額は―

translation.en: ...for 10 or 20, 30 million dollars.
translation.ja: 頼んでいない

translation.en: I'm just asking for a bit of help.
translation.ja: ほんの少しでいい

translation.en: Get me a little closer and I will get you that championship team.
translation.ja: ほんの少しで チームを 優勝させる

translation.en: I mean, this is why I'm here. This is why you hired me.
translation.ja: 僕はそのために雇われた

translation.en: And I gotta ask you, what are we doing here...
translation.ja: あんたはチームの オーナーだろ

translation.en: -Billy, I-- -...if it's not to win a championship?
translation.ja: あんたはチームの オーナーだろ 優勝しなければ

translation.en: -I wanna win just as much-- -That's my bar. My bar is here.
translation.ja: 僕の狙いはここだ

translation.en: My bar is to take this team to the championship.
translation.ja: 狙いは優勝することだ

translation.en: Billy, we're a small-market team, and you're a small-market GM.
translation.ja: ビリー　うちは小さな球団で 君はそこのＧＭだ

translation.en: I'm asking you to be okay not spending money that I don't have.
translation.ja: 頼むから ありもしない金を 使うのはやめてくれ

translation.en: And I'm asking you to take a deep breath...
translation.ja: 気を落ちつけて なくしたものは忘れ―

translation.en: ...shake off the loss, get back in a room with your guys...
translation.ja: 気を落ちつけて なくしたものは忘れ― 部屋に戻って―

translation.en: ...and figure out how to find replacements for the guys we lost... ...with the money that we do have.
translation.ja: 今ある金で 替わりの選手を 探すんだ

translation.en: I'm not leaving here. I'm not-- I can't leave here with that.
translation.ja: 戻れない そんな答えじゃ戻れない

translation.en: What else can I help you with?
translation.ja: ほかの頼みは？

translation.en: It's a good offer, and you gotta match it. I--
translation.ja: 結構いい話だぞ

translation.en: I need another day.
translation.ja: 考えさせろ

translation.en: His mind's pretty made up. I just think you should know that.
translation.ja: あっちはその気になってる

translation.en: -I got a call. I'll get you back. -I'll let him know.
translation.ja: 電話だ　かけ直す 考えてくれ

translation.en: Bye.
translation.ja: じゃあ

translation.en: -Yeah? -Billy, Scott.
translation.ja: スコットだ ダンから電話があった

translation.en: -Just got off the phone with Dan. -You didn't.
translation.ja: スコットだ ダンから電話があった ふざけるな

translation.en: I was surprised he called me.
translation.ja: こっちも驚いたよ

translation.en: Stop. I got Johnny for 7.5 or he doesn't play anywhere else.
translation.ja: デーモンは750万ドルで ここに残す約束だ

translation.en: -That's the deal you made. -Boston just upped it to 7.75.
translation.ja: デーモンは750万ドルで ここに残す約束だ レッドソックスが775万を

translation.en: You there?
translation.ja: 聞いてるか？

translation.en: -We had a deal, Scott. -We have a deal, if it's 8 million.
translation.ja: 話はついてた つくさ　800万出せば

translation.en: -Oh, man, you played me. -I'm just doing my job for my client.
translation.ja: ハメやがったな 仕事だ

translation.en: No, you're playing me, and you're still playing me.
translation.ja: 俺をハメやがった

translation.en: Congratulations, asshole. You win.
translation.ja: お前の勝ちだよ

translation.en: I like guys that got a little hair on their ass.
translation.ja: “ＦＡ選手” “ジオンビ　デーモン イズリングハウゼン”

translation.en: He looks like a Mantle or a Mays, quite frankly.
translation.ja: “ジオンビ　デーモン イズリングハウゼン”

translation.en: -He's got a baseball body. -Matty, who do you got?
translation.ja: マティ　お薦めは？

translation.en: -I like Geronimo. -Yes.
translation.ja: ジェロニモだ

translation.en: The guy's an athlete. Big, fast, talented.
translation.ja: デカいし足も速くて 才能もある

translation.en: -Top of my list. -Clean-cut, good face.
translation.ja: 見かけもいい

translation.en: -Yeah, good jaw. -Five-tools guy.
translation.ja: ５拍子揃ってる

translation.en: -Good-looking ballplayer. -Can he hit?
translation.ja: ５拍子揃ってる 打撃は？

translation.en: -He's got a beautiful swing. -The ball explodes off his bat.
translation.ja: 見事なスイングだ ボールが炸裂

translation.en: He throws the club head at the ball, and when he connects...
translation.ja: バットの芯でとらえ― 当たると ボールが かっ飛んでいく

translation.en: ...he drives it, it pops off the bat.
translation.ja: 当たると ボールが かっ飛んでいく

translation.en: -You can hear it all over the ballpark. -A lot of pop.
translation.ja: 球場に快音が響く よく打つ

translation.en: If he's good, why doesn't he hit good?
translation.ja: だがヒットが少ない

translation.en: -He is a good hitter. -He'll be ready.
translation.ja: まだマイナーだ

translation.en: He's gonna be a good hitter against big-league arms?
translation.ja: メジャーに来れば打てるのか

translation.en: -Could be great. -I don't think so.
translation.ja: メジャーに来れば打てるのか ありえない

translation.en: Kid needs at bats. Give him 400 at bats, he's gonna get better.
translation.ja: 経験が少ない 積めばよくなる

translation.en: -He can play. -He's hit everywhere along the line.
translation.ja: どこでも活躍する

translation.en: He's one of our guys.
translation.ja: 絶対いい

translation.en: Okay, let's move on.
translation.ja: 次にいこう

translation.en: -Artie, who do you like? -I like Perez. He's got a classic swing.
translation.ja: アーティ　誰がいい？ ペレスだ　スイングがいいし クセもない

translation.en: -It's a real clean stroke. -I don't know. Can't hit the curveball.
translation.ja: ペレスだ　スイングがいいし クセもない カーブに弱い

translation.en: There's some work to be done, I'll admit that, but he's noticeable.
translation.ja: 未熟な部分もあるが 目を引く

translation.en: -Got an ugly girlfriend. -What's that mean?
translation.ja: 彼女がブスだ

translation.en: Ugly girlfriend means no confidence.
translation.ja: 自分に自信がない

translation.en: You are full of it. Artie is right. This guy's got an attitude. An attitude is good.
translation.ja: バカ言え　むしろナマイキだ そこがいい

translation.en: He walks in a room, his dick's already been there for two minutes.
translation.ja: チンポコ見れば 自信がみなぎってる

translation.en: He passes the eye-candy test. Got the looks.
translation.ja: 見かけは悪くない

translation.en: He's ready to play the part. He just needs playing time.
translation.ja: 見た目もいい 必要なのは経験だけだ

translation.en: I'm just saying, his girlfriend is a six at best.
translation.ja: 奴の女は並みだね

translation.en: Look, if we're trying to replace Giambi, this guy could be it.
translation.ja: ジオンビの替わりは こいつだろ

translation.en: Damn, Billy, was that a suggestion?
translation.ja: ビリー　何か？

translation.en: Guys, you're just talking.
translation.ja: おしゃべりばかり

translation.en: Talking...like this is business as usual.
translation.ja: ベラベラ それが仕事だと思ってる

translation.en: It's not.
translation.ja: 違う

translation.en: We're trying to solve the problem.
translation.ja: 問題を解決したい

translation.en: Not like this. You're not looking at the problem.
translation.ja: 何が問題かも分かってない

translation.en: We're very aware of the problem. I mean--
translation.ja: 本気で考えてる

translation.en: Okay, good. What's the problem?
translation.ja: いいだろ　何が問題だ？

translation.en: Look, Billy, we all understand what the problem is.
translation.ja: ビリー　皆 問題は 分かってる

translation.en: -We have to-- -Okay, good. What's the problem?
translation.ja: ビリー　皆 問題は 分かってる じゃ 何が問題だ？

translation.en: We have to replace three key players in our lineup.
translation.ja: 問題は キープレーヤーの 後継を…

translation.en: Nope. What's the problem?
translation.ja: 違う　問題は？

translation.en: We gotta replace these guys with what we have--
translation.ja: いつも通り 抜けた穴を埋める

translation.en: No. What's the problem, Barry?
translation.ja: 違う　バリーは？

translation.en: We need 38 home runs, 120 RBIs and 47 doubles to replace.
translation.ja: 本塁打38　打点120の男の 替わりを…

translation.en: The problem we're trying to solve is that there are rich teams...
translation.ja: 問題は 金持ちチームがあり 貧乏チームがある

translation.en: ...and there are poor teams, then there's 50 feet of crap...
translation.ja: 問題は 金持ちチームがあり 貧乏チームがある そのあとクソがあり そして我々だ

translation.en: ...and then there's us.
translation.ja: そのあとクソがあり そして我々だ

translation.en: It's an unfair game.
translation.ja: 不公平な戦いだ

translation.en: And now we've been gutted. We're like organ donors for the rich.
translation.ja: 我々は 金持ちに 臓器を提供してる

translation.en: Boston's taken our kidneys, Yankees have taken our heart.
translation.ja: レッドソックスに腎臓 ヤンキースに心臓

translation.en: And you guys sit around...
translation.ja: なのに君らは相変わらず 見かけの話ばかり

translation.en: ...talking the same old "good body" nonsense like we're selling jeans.
translation.ja: なのに君らは相変わらず 見かけの話ばかり まるで“ファビオ”でも 探してるみたいだ

translation.en: Like we're looking for Fabio.
translation.ja: まるで“ファビオ”でも 探してるみたいだ

translation.en: We got to think differently.
translation.ja: 考え方を変えろ

translation.en: We are the last dog at the bowl.
translation.ja: すでに いい餌は食われてる

translation.en: You see what happens to the runt of the litter? He dies.
translation.ja: 餌の食えない子犬は― 死ぬだけだ

translation.en: Billy, that's a very touching story and everything... ...but I think we're all very much aware of what we're facing.
translation.ja: ビリー　涙の出る話だが みんな状況は分かってる

translation.en: You have a lot of experience and wisdom in this room.
translation.ja: ここには知恵と経験が 集まってる

translation.en: You need to have a little faith and let us do the job of replacing Giambi.
translation.ja: もう少し信頼して ジオンビの後継を探させろ

translation.en: Is there another first baseman like Giambi?
translation.ja: 後を継げる奴は？

translation.en: -No, not really. -No.
translation.ja: いない

translation.en: -If there was, could we afford him? -Nope.
translation.ja: いたとして年俸は？ 払えない

translation.en: Then what the fuck are you talking about, man?
translation.ja: だったら何を言ってる？

translation.en: If we try to play like the Yankees in here...
translation.ja: ここでヤンキースの マネをしても―

translation.en: ...we will lose to the Yankees out there.
translation.ja: ヤンキースには勝てない

translation.en: Boy, that sounds like fortune-cookie wisdom to me, Billy.
translation.ja: 占いでもやったのか

translation.en: -No, that's just logic. -Who's Fabio?
translation.ja: 筋論だ “ファビオ”って？

translation.en: He's a shortstop. He's a shortstop from Seattle.
translation.ja: ショートだろ シアトルの…

translation.en: Now, this is no time to push the panic button.
translation.ja: 騒ぐ必要はない

translation.en: Our scouts will find players, Player Development will develop them.
translation.ja: 我々スカウトは 選手を見つけ―

translation.en: We'll teach them to play Oakland A baseball.
translation.ja: チームの選手に育て上げる

translation.en: With all due respect, we've been doing this a long time.
translation.ja: 今までずっとやってきた

translation.en: Why don't you just let us be responsible for replacing Giambi... ...with who we know that can play?
translation.ja: 我々に任せろ　ジオンビの 後釜はちゃんと見つける

translation.en: -Easy power. -And loose.
translation.ja: りきみがない 力も抜けて 顔もいい

translation.en: Good face.
translation.ja: 力も抜けて 顔もいい

translation.en: This son of a bitch is going in the first round.
translation.ja: こいつは１位指名だな

translation.en: You're a premium player, Billy.
translation.ja: 君は最高だ　走れるし 守備もいい

translation.en: You can run, you can field, you can throw, you can hit...
translation.ja: 君は最高だ　走れるし 守備もいい 投球も 打撃もいい 強打者だ

translation.en: ...you can hit with power.
translation.ja: 投球も 打撃もいい 強打者だ

translation.en: That doesn't come along very often.
translation.ja: 揃うのは珍しい

translation.en: This is Tom Martinez, national cross-checker.
translation.ja: マルティネスさん スカウトだ

translation.en: -How you doing? Nice to meet you. -Billy Beane.
translation.ja: ビリーです よろしく

translation.en: It's been a while since I've seen a five-tool guy that can do everything.
translation.ja: ５拍子揃った選手に 出会ったのは久しぶりだ

translation.en: I'm hopeful your interest in professional baseball...
translation.ja: プロ入りに興味を 持ってくれれば ぜひとも―

translation.en: ...is as strong as ours is gonna be in getting you in this upcoming draft.
translation.ja: プロ入りに興味を 持ってくれれば ぜひとも― ドラフトにかけたい

translation.en: Mr. Beane?
translation.ja: ビーンさん

translation.en: Mark is ready to see you now.
translation.ja: どうぞ お部屋に

translation.en: -How you doing? -I'm fine.
translation.ja: 元気かい そちらは？

translation.en: -How are you? -Good.
translation.ja: 元気だ

translation.en: -Hey, Billy. -Hey, Mark.
translation.ja: ビリー マーク

translation.en: -Good to see you. Please sit down. -You too.
translation.ja: よく来た 掛けてくれ

translation.en: -These are the guys. Guys, Billy. -Boys.
translation.ja: みんな　ビリーだ

translation.en: -How's it going? -All right. How you been?
translation.ja: 元気か その椅子 心地よさそうだ

translation.en: -You're filling out that chair nicely. -I got three weeks in it right now.
translation.ja: その椅子 心地よさそうだ やっと３週間目だ

translation.en: Good, good, man.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: -Yeah, man. How you doing? -Fantastic.
translation.ja: 君は元気か ゴキゲンだ

translation.en: -Awesome. -Couldn't be better.
translation.ja: 最高だよ

translation.en: That's good to hear. I'm not gonna waste your time. You just tell me what you're looking for.
translation.ja: よかった　本題に入ろう 何が欲しい？

translation.en: Fifty million dollars in additional payroll.
translation.ja: 追加予算5000万

translation.en: You should try Giambi.
translation.ja: ジオンビに頼め

translation.en: I'm sorry. Too soon, right? I want this to be a friendly meeting.
translation.ja: イタッ！ 笑えないか 協力はしたいが 君一人で頑張らなくても

translation.en: It's not all on your shoulders.
translation.ja: 協力はしたいが 君一人で頑張らなくても

translation.en: -Where's Steve in this? -Steve's great.
translation.ja: オーナーは？ 再建に100％ 協力してくれてる

translation.en: He's supportive in rebuilding this team.
translation.ja: 再建に100％ 協力してくれてる

translation.en: That's what we're gonna do.
translation.ja: 心強いよ

translation.en: -So, what are you looking for? -A left-handed reliever.
translation.ja: 何が欲しい？ 左投手

translation.en: I'm thinking Ricardo Rincon.
translation.ja: リカルド･リンカン

translation.en: That's not gonna happen.
translation.ja: それはムリだ

translation.en: Not even a discussion?
translation.ja: 議論の余地は？

translation.en: Billy, even if you could afford him, respectfully, we love him.
translation.ja: たとえ君に金が払えても… すまんな

translation.en: We're not about to let him go.
translation.ja: 彼は手放せない

translation.en: You got this Venezuelan kid coming up.
translation.ja: あのベネズエラ人は？

translation.en: We had him. We moved him to Detroit.
translation.ja: デトロイトへ移った

translation.en: What else you thinking?
translation.ja: ほかには？

translation.en: Outfielders.
translation.ja: 外野手

translation.en: -To replace Damon? -Yeah.
translation.ja: デーモンの後か？

translation.en: -In your price range? No disrespect. -Enough, Mark.
translation.ja: 君の予算で？　怒るな いいさ

translation.en: Hollins?
translation.ja: ホリンズ？

translation.en: -García? -No.
translation.ja: ガルシア？ いいや

translation.en: Maybe Coste.
translation.ja: コスタかな？

translation.en: That's it.
translation.ja: もうない

translation.en: -All right, tell me about García. -To replace Johnny Damon?
translation.ja: ガルシアは？ デーモンの替わりに？

translation.en: -Mark, is he healthy? -Yeah, he's healthy-ish.
translation.ja: 健康は？ 健康ぶってる

translation.en: He had that back thing.
translation.ja: 正直 背中が悪い

translation.en: -He'll be ready for spring ball. -I'll tell you what.
translation.ja: キャンプは出られる うちのガスリーを出す 現金を積め

translation.en: I can give you Guthrie if you kick in some cash.
translation.ja: うちのガスリーを出す 現金を積め

translation.en: -Mark Guthrie? -Yeah.
translation.ja: マーク･ガスリー

translation.en: -How much cash? -Two hundred K.
translation.ja: いくら 欲しい？ 20万ドル

translation.en: -So García's gonna be a no. -You're kidding me, right?
translation.ja: ガルシアはノーだ 冗談だろ

translation.en: -You're kidding me. -I'm not.
translation.ja: まさか 本当だ

translation.en: Okay. Straight up, García for Guthrie, no kicker.
translation.ja: よし　金はいい 単なるトレードだ

translation.en: -No kicker? -Straight up.
translation.ja: 金はナシ？ そうだ

translation.en: I think it's gonna be a hard no on García, but let's just keep going.
translation.ja: 残念だがガルシアはダメだ 話を続けよう

translation.en: -What else you thinking? -What are we doing? Is this business?
translation.ja: 何のつもりだ？ これが商売か？

translation.en: This is the way we do business in Cleveland.
translation.ja: インディアンスの商売だ

translation.en: -Hello. -Who are you?
translation.ja: 君は誰だ？

translation.en: I'm Peter Brand.
translation.ja: ピーター･ブランド

translation.en: What do you do?
translation.ja: 仕事は？

translation.en: I'm special assistant to Mark Shapiro.
translation.ja: マーク･シャパイロの 補佐です

translation.en: So, what do you do?
translation.ja: 何してる？

translation.en: Mostly player analysis right now.
translation.ja: 選手たちの分析です

translation.en: Been on the job long? First job in baseball?
translation.ja: 長く仕事を？ 野球は初めてか

translation.en: It's my first job anywhere.
translation.ja: 人生 初めての仕事です

translation.en: -Wow, congrats. -Thank you.
translation.ja: おめでとう どうも

translation.en: First job. Whose nephew are you?
translation.ja: 初めて？ 誰の親戚だ？

translation.en: Why does Mark listen to you?
translation.ja: なぜ奴が話を聞く？

translation.en: I don't think.... I don't think he does very often.
translation.ja: シャパイロは僕の話は あまり聞かない

translation.en: He just did.
translation.ja: 聞いてた

translation.en: Well, in that circumstance... ...I think he was more listening to Bruce than myself.
translation.ja: あれは むしろ ブルースの話を聞いてた

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.ja: 君は？

translation.en: I'm Peter Brand.
translation.ja: ピーターです

translation.en: I don't give a rat's ass what your name is.
translation.ja: 名前なんて どうでもいい

translation.en: What happened in there?
translation.ja: 何があった？

translation.en: What happened in that room?
translation.ja: さっき あの部屋で

translation.en: I'm not quite sure what you're asking me, Mr. Beane.
translation.ja: 質問の意味が分かりません

translation.en: What did you tell Bruce?
translation.ja: 何をブルースに？

translation.en: -I just told Bruce I like García. -You like García. Why?
translation.ja: ガルシアは大事だと ガルシアが　なぜ？

translation.en: Why?
translation.ja: なぜだ

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.ja: なぜって…

translation.en: There is an epidemic failure within the game... ...to understand what is really happening.
translation.ja: 野球で何を把握すべきか 誤解してる人が多すぎる

translation.en: And this leads people who run Major League Baseball teams...
translation.ja: メジャーリーグを 運営する人たちが―

translation.en: ...to misjudge their players and mismanage their teams.
translation.ja: 選手やチームを 理解していない

translation.en: I apologize.
translation.ja: 失礼なことを…

translation.en: Go on.
translation.ja: 続けろ

translation.en: Okay. People who run ball clubs, they think in terms of buying players.
translation.ja: 球団の人々は 金で 選手を買おうと思ってる

translation.en: Your goal shouldn't be to buy players. Your goal should be to buy wins.
translation.ja: だが本当は選手でなく “勝利”を買うべきだ

translation.en: And in order to buy wins, you need to buy runs. You're trying to replace Johnny Damon.
translation.ja: それには得点が必要です デーモンの替わり？

translation.en: The Red Sox see Johnny Damon... ...and they see a star who's worth $7.5 million a year.
translation.ja: レッドソックスはデーモンを 750万ドル以上の価値と見た

translation.en: When I see Johnny Damon...
translation.ja: 僕から見れば―

translation.en: ...what I see is...
translation.ja: 彼は―

translation.en: ...an imperfect understanding of where runs come from.
translation.ja: 得点の取り方が よく分かってない

translation.en: The guy's got a great glove. He's a decent leadoff hitter. He can steal bases.
translation.ja: 彼は守備はいい １番打者で 盗塁もうまい

translation.en: But is he worth the $7.5 million a year... ...that the Boston Red Sox are paying him?
translation.ja: だが年俸750万ドルも 払う価値があるか

translation.en: No. No.
translation.ja: ノーです

translation.en: Baseball thinking is medieval.
translation.ja: 野球界は古臭い

translation.en: They are asking all the wrong questions.
translation.ja: 求めるものを間違えてる

translation.en: And if I say it to anybody, I'm ostracized. I'm a leper.
translation.ja: だが それを言うと 僕は村八分にされる

translation.en: So that's why I'm cagey about this with you.
translation.ja: だが それを言うと 僕は村八分にされる だから あなたにも 言わなかった

translation.en: That's why-- I respect you, Mr. Beane, and if you want full disclosure...
translation.ja: だが あなたを尊敬してます 正直言って―

translation.en: ...I think it's a good thing that you got Damon off your payroll.
translation.ja: デーモンを放出したのは 正解です

translation.en: I think it opens up all kinds of interesting possibilities.
translation.ja: お陰で あらゆる 可能性ができた

translation.en: -Where you from, Pete? -Maryland.
translation.ja: 出身は？ メリーランド

translation.en: -Where'd you go to school? -Yale. I went to Yale.
translation.ja: 学校は？ イエール大学

translation.en: -What'd you study? -Economics.
translation.ja: 専攻は？ 経済学

translation.en: I studied economics.
translation.ja: 経済専攻です

translation.en: Yale, economics and baseball.
translation.ja: イエール大　経済学 野球か

translation.en: You're funny, Pete.
translation.ja: 面白い

translation.en: Tell me, why Billy? What is it that makes him special?
translation.ja: 一体ビリーのどこが 特別なんです？

translation.en: Very rare do you come upon a young man like Billy...
translation.ja: ビリーのような若者は 珍しい

translation.en: ...who can run, who can field, who can throw, who can hit...
translation.ja: 走れるし 守れるし― 投げるし 打てる それも強打者だ

translation.en: ...and who can hit with power.
translation.ja: 投げるし 打てる それも強打者だ

translation.en: Those five tools, you don't see that very often.
translation.ja: ５拍子が揃ってる者は めったにいない

translation.en: Most of the youngsters that we have an interest in...
translation.ja: 私たちが出会う ほとんどの若者は―

translation.en: ...have one or two tools... ...and we're hoping to develop an extra one.
translation.ja: その１つか２つだけで ３つ目が育てばいい

translation.en: Your son has five.
translation.ja: 息子さんは５拍子ある

translation.en: We're looking at a guy that's a potential superstar for us in New York.
translation.ja: ニューヨークで スーパースターになる

translation.en: The time is now to get him started.
translation.ja: 今がチャンスです

translation.en: We're prepared to make a sizable financial commitment.
translation.ja: 高額の契約金を用意しました

translation.en: The Mets are gonna stand behind Billy...
translation.ja: メッツは応援する

translation.en: ...because we expect him to be our big-league center fielder.
translation.ja: 君を偉大なセンターに 育てたい

translation.en: This check here represents the offer... ...that the New York Mets would be making to Billy.
translation.ja: この小切手がメッツの 彼への気持ちです

translation.en: You do know that he's been accepted to Stanford on a full scholarship?
translation.ja: スタンフォード大学の 奨学生になれるんです

translation.en: I do.
translation.ja: 知ってます

translation.en: So he can do both?
translation.ja: では両立が可能だと？

translation.en: Unfortunately, he can't do Stanford and professional baseball.
translation.ja: 残念ですが 大学とプロの 両立はできません

translation.en: He would have to pick one or the other.
translation.ja: どちらかを 選ばねばなりません

translation.en: If he wants to be center fielder for the Mets... ...wants to be a baseball player...
translation.ja: もしメッツのセンターに なろうと思うなら―

translation.en: ...he really needs to accept this as life's first occupation, first career.
translation.ja: これを自分の一番の職業に しなければなりません

translation.en: We're all told at some point we can no longer play the children's game.
translation.ja: 誰でも少年野球を 卒業する日が来る

translation.en: We just don't know when that's gonna be.
translation.ja: それが いつかは人による

translation.en: Some of us are told at 18, some of us are told at 40, but we're all told.
translation.ja: ある者は18歳だし 40歳の者もいる だが いつか来る　これは 生涯一度のチャンスだ

translation.en: But this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
translation.ja: だが いつか来る　これは 生涯一度のチャンスだ

translation.en: We want you badly... ...and we think that this amount of money expresses that desire.
translation.ja: 我々は君が欲しい この金額が語ってる

translation.en: Billy, this is your decision, and whatever that decision is...
translation.ja: 決めるのはお前だ どう決めても 母さんも私も文句はない

translation.en: ...you know it's fine with your mother and I.
translation.ja: どう決めても 母さんも私も文句はない

translation.en: -Hello? -Hey, it's Billy Beane.
translation.ja: ビリーだ

translation.en: -Hey, what time is it? -I don't know.
translation.ja: 今 何時です？ 知らない

translation.en: Listen, would you have drafted me in the first round?
translation.ja: 質問だ 君なら俺を指名したか？

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何です？

translation.en: After I left, you looked me up on your computer.
translation.ja: 俺をパソコンで調べたろ

translation.en: Would you have drafted me in the first round?
translation.ja: ドラフト１位指名にしたか？

translation.en: I did, yeah. You were a good player.
translation.ja: しました　優秀な選手だった

translation.en: Cut the crap, man.
translation.ja: ふざけるな

translation.en: Would you have drafted me in the first round?
translation.ja: 本当に１位指名したか？

translation.en: I'd have taken you in the ninth round. No signing bonus.
translation.ja: ９位指名です　契約金はなし

translation.en: I imagine you would've passed and taken that scholarship.
translation.ja: メッツは忘れて 大学に行くべきだった

translation.en: Pack your bags, Pete.
translation.ja: 荷作りをしろ

translation.en: I just bought you from the Cleveland Indians.
translation.ja: インディアンスから 君を買った

translation.en: -Is it attached to that clamp? -Yeah, let me unhook it.
translation.ja: “イズリングハウゼン ジオンビ　デーモン”

translation.en: -Morning, Suzanne. Coffee on? -Yes.
translation.ja: おはよう　コーヒーは？

translation.en: -Peter Brand. -Billy.
translation.ja: ピーター

translation.en: -How are--? Hi, how you doing? -Nice to see you.
translation.ja: 元気か

translation.en: Good to have you here. Boy, you move in fast.
translation.ja: よく来た もう部屋に？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. I got here early this morning.
translation.ja: 早朝 着いて

translation.en: -All moved in. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 引っ越しを

translation.en: Hey, Billy...
translation.ja: ビリー

translation.en: ...I wanted you to see these player evaluations... ...that you asked me to do.
translation.ja: あなたに頼まれた 選手の評価を見てほしい

translation.en: I asked you to do three.
translation.ja: 頼んだのは３人だ

translation.en: -To evaluate three players. -Yeah.
translation.ja: ３人だぞ

translation.en: How many did you do?
translation.ja: 何人調べた？

translation.en: Forty-seven.
Actually, 51. I don't know why I lied just then.
translation.ja: 本当は51人　ついウソを…

translation.en: Why don't you walk me through the board?
translation.ja: ボードで説明しろ

translation.en: Using this equation in the upper left...
translation.ja: この方程式から―

translation.en: ...I'm projecting that we need to win at least 99 games... ...in order to make it to the postseason.
translation.ja: プレーオフに行くには 99戦は勝つ必要がある

translation.en: We need to score at least 814 runs in order to win those games...
translation.ja: それには最低でも 814得点が必要

translation.en: ...and allow no more than 645 runs.
translation.ja: 失点は最大645点まで

translation.en: What's this?
translation.ja: これは？

translation.en: This is a code that I've written for our year-to-year projections.
translation.ja: 我々の年次計画です

translation.en: This is building in the intelligence that we have to project players.
translation.ja: 選手を予想する情報が 詰まってます

translation.en: It's about getting things down to one number.
translation.ja: ここから一つの数字を 導き出します

translation.en: Using the stats the way we read them...
translation.ja: 選手の統計を取り―

translation.en: ...we'll find value in players that nobody else can see.
translation.ja: 誰も知らない価値を 見つけだす

translation.en: People are overlooked... ...for a variety of biased reasons and perceived flaws.
translation.ja: 選手の評価には 先入観や 目に見える欠陥―

translation.en: Age, appearance, personality.
translation.ja: 年齢 見かけなどが 入ってる

translation.en: Bill James and mathematics cut straight through that.
translation.ja: ビル･ジェイムズはそこに 数値でメスを入れた

translation.en: Billy, of the 20,000 notable players for us to consider...
translation.ja: 対象の選手は２万はいる

translation.en: ...I believe that there is a championship team... ...of 25 people that we can afford...
translation.ja: そこから 我々の予算内で “25人の優勝チーム”を作れます

translation.en: ...because everyone else in baseball undervalues them.
translation.ja: 皆 他チームの評価は低い

translation.en: Like an island of misfit toys.
translation.ja: まるで欠陥品扱いだ

translation.en: Billy, this is Chad Bradford. He's a relief pitcher.
translation.ja: チャド･ブラッドフォード リリーフ投手

translation.en: He is one of the most undervalued players in baseball.
translation.ja: 球界一 過小評価をされている

translation.en: His defect is that he throws funny.
translation.ja: 欠点は 投げ方が変わってる

translation.en: Nobody in the big leagues cares about him because he looks funny.
translation.ja: 誰も彼に注目しない 投げ方がヘンだ

translation.en: This guy could be not just the best pitcher in our pen... ...but one of the most effective relief pitchers in all baseball.
translation.ja: だが彼は球界一活躍する リリーフ投手になるでしょう

translation.en: This guy should cost $3 million a year. We can get him for 237,000.
translation.ja: 300万ドルの価値ある男が 23万7000ドルで手に入る

translation.en: Billy.
translation.ja: ビリー

translation.en: -That it? -Yeah.
translation.ja: それか？

translation.en: Hey, Art.
translation.ja: アート

translation.en: Can I talk to you before you get started?
translation.ja: ちょっと話がしたい

translation.en: -I'm a bit busy right now. -I know.
translation.ja: 今 忙しい 分かってる

translation.en: -I know. -Okay.
translation.ja: 頼む

translation.en: -Peter Brand. Nice to meet you. -Where the hell's Pete?
translation.ja: ピーターです

translation.en: That's Pete.
translation.ja: ピーターだ

translation.en: Grab a seat. I'll be right back.
translation.ja: 座れ　すぐ戻る

translation.en: -Who's the kid? -A friend of mine.
translation.ja: あいつは？ 友達だ

translation.en: I can't manage this team under a one-year contract.
translation.ja: １年契約で監督はできない

translation.en: Well, sure you can.
translation.ja: できるさ

translation.en: No, I can't.
translation.ja: ムリだ

translation.en: Okay. I gotta put a team on the field.
translation.ja: まずはチーム作りが先だ

translation.en: After that, I'll take a good long look at your contract.
translation.ja: そのあと契約書を精査しよう

translation.en: Deal with the manager's contract, then put a team on the field.
translation.ja: チームより監督の話が先だろ

translation.en: At this moment, if a grounder's hit to first, nobody's there to stop it.
translation.ja: 今 １塁ゴロを打たれたら 誰も止める者がいない

translation.en: It's not easy doing what I do under the cloud of a one-year contract.
translation.ja: 不安定な１年契約じゃ 皆の監督はできない

translation.en: Okay, I understand that.
translation.ja: 気持ちは分かる

translation.en: -I've been there. -I know you have.
translation.ja: だろうな

translation.en: A one-year contract means the same thing to a manager as to a player.
translation.ja: １年契約では 選手も監督も不安だ

translation.en: There's not a lot of faith there. Which is strange after a 102-win season.
translation.ja: 納得できんよ 今シーズンは102勝した

translation.en: I see. If you lose the last game of the season, nobody gives a shit.
translation.ja: しかし 最後の１戦で負けたら すべては帳消しだ

translation.en: -So it's on me now? -No, Art, it's on me.
translation.ja: 俺の責任か 違う　僕の責任だ

translation.en: And the kid is the new assistant GM.
translation.ja: あの若者は僕の補佐だ

translation.en: You can't deny his offensive output. He can play.
translation.ja: あいつは攻めの野球をやる

translation.en: And we need people that can play.
translation.ja: ああいう選手が必要だ

translation.en: Who do you wanna talk about first?
translation.ja: なら誰を推す？

translation.en: None of them.
translation.ja: 誰もいない

translation.en: Billy, we got 38 home runs, 120 RBIs to make up for.
translation.ja: だが本塁打38本の替わりを…

translation.en: Guys, you're still trying to replace Giambi. I told you we can't do it, and we can't do it.
translation.ja: ジオンビの替わりを 見つけるのはムリだ

translation.en: Now, what we might be able to do is re-create him.
translation.ja: だが彼の穴を 埋めることはできる

translation.en: -Re-create him in the aggregate. -The what?
translation.ja: 何人かで埋める つまり？

translation.en: Giambi's on-base percentage was .477.
translation.ja: ジオンビの出塁率は .477

translation.en: Damon's on-base, .324. And Olmedo's was .291.
translation.ja: デーモンは .324 オルメドは .291

translation.en: Add that up and you get....
translation.ja: 全部 足すと？

translation.en: Do you want me to speak?
translation.ja: 僕が答えを？

translation.en: When I point at you, yeah.
translation.ja: 指差したろ

translation.en: -1.092. -Divided by three.
-.364. -That's what we're looking for.
translation.ja: .364 それを探すんだ

translation.en: Three ballplayers-- Three ballplayers whose average OBP is....
translation.ja: 選手３人 １人の平均出塁率が…

translation.en: -Wait, that doesn't come out right. -It's right, Artie.
translation.ja: 計算が合わんな

translation.en: -Billy. -You gotta carry the one.
translation.ja: ここが違う

translation.en: -Billy. -Scratch this out.
translation.ja: ビリー

translation.en: -Yeah? -Who's that?
translation.ja: こいつは？

translation.en: That's Pete.
translation.ja: ピーター

translation.en: -Does Pete really need to be here? -Yes, he does.
translation.ja: 彼はここに必要か？ 必要だ

translation.en: Okay, here's who we want.
translation.ja: 欲しい奴の名前を言う

translation.en: Number one: Jason's little brother, Jeremy.
translation.ja: １番目　ジオンビの弟 ジェレミー

translation.en: -Oh, God. -Billy, that's trouble.
translation.ja: 面倒だぞ

translation.en: Billy, look, if I-- Yeah.
translation.ja: ビリー　待て

translation.en: Billy, if I may, he has had his problems off the field...
translation.ja: あいつは― 私生活はひどいし 守備も からっきしだ

translation.en: ...and we know what he can't do on the field.
translation.ja: 私生活はひどいし 守備も からっきしだ

translation.en: He's getting thick around the waist.
translation.ja: 腹も出てきた

translation.en: There's reports about him on weed, in strip clubs.
translation.ja: マリファナにストリップ通い

translation.en: His on-base percentage is all we're looking at now.

translation.en: -No. -The fact of the matter is...

translation.en: The past 18 games, they've been shut out or scored one run four times.

translation.en: They're just not scoring enough.

translation.en: It's not just the offense, not Thad Bosley and the hitters.

translation.en: It's everything. If there was one thing you could pick out, you'd try to fix it...

translation.en: ...but just everything is in a funk right now.

translation.en: Look, Steve.

translation.en: I believe in what we're doing.

translation.en: Now, Pete and I here feel very strongly that we stay on the track we've chosen.

translation.en: Early. It's still early.

translation.en: Our goal and our expectation...

translation.ja: 目標は７月中旬までに― １位と７ゲーム差に

translation.en: That would be this working.

translation.en: -That keeps us in the hunt. -Exceptionally well.

translation.en: -By July. -July.

translation.en: And what's gonna prevent you from accomplishing that?

translation.en: What are you afraid of?

translation.en: The all-time record of 20 does not seem impossible anymore.
translation.ja: ここまで来ると 20連勝も不可能じゃない

translation.en: The A's were on page one of the New York Times. They are the story in sports in this entire country.
translation.ja: アスレチックスは 全国的ニュースになってます

translation.en: Two-two pitch, here it is.
translation.ja: 投げました

translation.en: Swing and a miss! Struck him out! Number 17!
translation.ja: 空振りだ　アウト 17連勝です！

translation.en: It's taken 71 years.
translation.ja: 〝17連勝〞 71年ぶり 71年ぶり

translation.en: The Oakland A's have tied the Philadelphia A's.
translation.ja: フィラデルフィア時代の アスレチックスに並んだ

translation.en: The all-time franchise record 17 straight...
translation.ja: フランチャイズ記録　17連勝

translation.en: ...and baseball's longest winning streak since 1953.
translation.ja: 1953年以来の 最長連勝記録です

translation.en: The A's are two wins away from tying the American League record.
translation.ja: あと２連勝で ア･リーグの記録に並びます

translation.en: It's gone! It's gone! Tejada wins it! Do you believe it?
translation.ja: やった　テハダ ホームイン 信じられない！

translation.en: Eighteen wins in a row!
translation.ja: 18連勝です

translation.en: You could replay these 18 games a hundred times over.
translation.ja: ありえない数字です

translation.en: And nobody wins 18 straight again. It defies everything we know about baseball.
translation.ja: まさに球界の常識を 打ち破りました

translation.en: The most amazing thing you could imagine...
translation.ja: 〝負ける気がしない〞 驚くべきことが この４日間の― 驚くべきことが この４日間の―

translation.en: ...happened over the last four days at the Coliseum.
translation.ja: コロシアムで起こりました

translation.en: Tejada, up the middle. The A's have won 19 in a row!
translation.ja: テハダが打った！ アスレチックス19連勝！

translation.en: The 1906 White Sox...
translation.ja: 1906年のホワイトソックス

translation.en: ...the 1947 New York Yankees have company.
translation.ja: 1947年のヤンキースに 並びました

translation.en: -Nineteen in a row. -The A's have a date with destiny.
translation.ja: 19連勝です 水曜の夜 ロイヤルズ相手に―

translation.en: They're going for the all-time American League record... ...20 games in a row.
translation.ja: ア･リーグ新記録 20連勝なるか？

translation.en: We're going to 20!
translation.ja: 20連勝だ　ア･リーグの 20連勝記録を作ろう！

translation.en: We're gonna take the AL record to 20, baby!
translation.ja: 20連勝だ　ア･リーグの 20連勝記録を作ろう！ 20連勝だ　ア･リーグの 20連勝記録を作ろう！ 〝信じてる〞

translation.en: Don't tell me the score, Pete.
translation.ja: ２００２年９月４日 ２００２年９月４日 何だ　ピーター？

translation.en: No, Billy, it's me.
translation.ja: わたしよ

translation.en: -Sharon? -Yeah.
translation.ja: シャロン？

translation.en: -You have a second? -Yeah, what's up?
translation.ja: 今いい？ どうした

translation.en: Well, I didn't actually expect you to pick up. I was gonna leave a message.
translation.ja: 留守電だと思ったから 伝言を残そうと

translation.en: Casey and I, we're here and watching the game at home.
translation.ja: 今ケイシーと試合を見てるの

translation.en: And I just wanted to say...
translation.ja: 今ケイシーと試合を見てるの “あなた よくやってる”って 言いたかったの

translation.en: ...you did good, Billy.
translation.ja: “あなた よくやってる”って 言いたかったの

translation.en: We're really proud of you.
translation.ja: とても立派だわ

translation.en: I appreciate it, Sharon.
translation.ja: 嬉しいよ　ありがとう

translation.en: -Thank you. -Good luck.
translation.ja: 嬉しいよ　ありがとう 頑張って

translation.en: Oh, Casey wants to talk to you. Hang on.
translation.ja: ケイシーが話を

translation.en: Are you on your way to the stadium?
translation.ja: 今 球場に向かってる？

translation.en: No, I'm on my way to Visalia to see our minor-league team.
translation.ja: ヴァイセリアへ マイナーを見に行く

translation.en: -Turn around, please, Dad. -No way, Jose.
translation.ja: すぐに戻って イヤだね

translation.en: -Turn around. Come on, Dad. -Nope. Not gonna happen.
translation.ja: 戻って　パパ イヤだ

translation.en: You're not gonna jinx it.
translation.ja: ジンクスは忘れて

translation.en: I'll talk to you later, sweetheart. I love you.
translation.ja: またあとで　愛してる

translation.en: One out here in the fourth, and if you're just joining us... ...you missed a lot.
translation.ja: ４回表　アスレチックス すごい展開です

translation.en: And the pitch to Raúl Ibañez. Strike one.
translation.ja: 打席はイバニェス １ストライク

translation.en: I think my recap will be simple. The A's scored six in the first, one in the second, four in the third.
translation.ja: 得点をまとめると １回に６点 ２回１点　３回４点

translation.en: And people would be shocked if you just did that.
translation.ja: 聞くだけでビックリだ

translation.en: Eleven to nothing, the A's do lead. -Shit. -Foul off the foot of Ibañez....
translation.ja: 11対０　イバニェス ファール…

translation.en: Safe.
translation.ja: セーフ！

translation.en: And the A's now lead by a score of 11 to 3.
translation.ja: まだ11対３　点差はあります

translation.en: A nice cushion, but you don't wanna give teams life... ...and let them wedge their way back in, even when you're--
translation.ja: しかし 相手を勢いに 乗せたくはない　たとえ…

translation.en: Nobody out, the bases loaded.
translation.ja: ノーアウト 満塁

translation.en: And Art Howe on the way to the mound to make a pitching change.
translation.ja: 監督が出た　投手交代です

translation.en: And this game is still in a state... ...where it could get out of control for the Athletics.
translation.ja: アスレチックス　果たして 乱調から復活できるか

translation.en: We're all told at some point we can no longer play the children's game.
translation.ja: 誰でも少年野球を 卒業する日が来る

translation.en: We just don't know when that's gonna be.
translation.ja: それが いつかは人による

translation.en: Some of us are told at 18, some of us are told at 40, but we're all told.
translation.ja: ある者は18歳だし 40歳の者もいる だが いつか来る

translation.en: Mike Sweeney with runners at first and third.
translation.ja: スウィーニー ランナー１、３塁

translation.en: It's an 11-to-7 game, the A's in front.
translation.ja: 11対７でアスレチックス リード

translation.en: Tam peering in for the sign.
translation.ja: サインを読んでます

translation.en: Two out. Runners at first and third.
translation.ja: ２アウト　ランナー１、３塁

translation.en: And the 3-2 delivery.
translation.ja: ３ボール ２ストライク

translation.en: It's weird, Billy.
translation.ja: 分からんね　ビリー

translation.en: You wanna give up baseball to become a scout?
translation.ja: 選手を辞めて スカウトになりたいと？

translation.en: I'm not a baseball player.
translation.ja: 選手は向いてない

translation.en: Are you sure this is what you want?
translation.ja: 本気で思ってるのか

translation.en: The crowd is roaring. Koch is ready. One-two pitch.
translation.ja: 大歓声！ コッチが投げる ２ストライク

translation.en: Alicea puts it in play, a looper to left field for a base hit.
translation.ja: アリシア 打った　ヒット

translation.en: Around third, tearing for the plate, here comes the tying run.
translation.ja: ３塁を回った　同点なるか スライディング　セーフ！

translation.en: Sliding safe. And the ball game is tied at 11-all.
translation.ja: ３塁を回った　同点なるか スライディング　セーフ！ 11点　同点です

translation.en: Holy Toledo.
translation.ja: 驚きです！

translation.en: The A's have blown an 11-to-nothing lead.
translation.ja: ついに 11点差から 追いつかれた

translation.en: This is the specter of a development that has been lurking now...
translation.ja: 恐ろしい怪物が潜んでいたか

translation.en: ...ever since the five-run fourth inning by the Royals.
translation.ja: すべては４回の ５失点からです

translation.en: And the A's date with destiny is on hold right now.
translation.ja: 連勝記録達成も 危なくなりました

translation.en: Hatteberg. Hattie.
translation.ja: ハッテバーグ

translation.en: Grab a bat. You're hitting for Byrnesy.
translation.ja: バーンズの代打だ

translation.en: Come on, let's go. Get yourself loose.
translation.ja: 行け

translation.en: ...number 10, Scott Hatteberg.
translation.ja: 代打 スコット･ハッテバーグ

translation.en: In your typical A's fashion, they want a base runner here.
translation.ja: アスレチックス 何とかランナーを出したい

translation.en: Scott Hatteberg is so adept at drawing walks.
translation.ja: ハッテバーグは四球を 選ぶのがうまい

translation.en: He's looking for Hatteberg to get on base... ...maybe bring in a pinch runner.
translation.ja: ハッテバーグを出塁させて 代走を…

translation.en: That one is gone!
translation.ja: 入りました！

translation.en: And it's 20 consecutive victories for the Oakland Athletics...
translation.ja: やった！　アスレチックス 20連勝達成

translation.en: ...on an unbelievable night... ...when they lost an 11-to-nothing lead...
translation.ja: 信じられない夜です 11点差を追いつかれながら―

translation.en: ...and now they win it.
translation.ja: 勝利を収めました

translation.en: The crowd comes back to insane life.
translation.ja: 観衆は 歓喜の嵐です

translation.en: How do you explain it?
translation.ja: 何と言えばいい

translation.en: Crazy. Just plain crazy.
translation.ja: クレージー まさしくクレージー！

translation.en: Hatteberg is mobbed at home plate.
translation.ja: ハッテバーグが囲まれた

translation.en: In 103 years of American League baseball...
translation.ja: ア･リーグ103年の歴史で―

translation.en: ...the Athletics have accomplished what no one has before.
translation.ja: 前人未到の記録を 打ち立てました

translation.en: They have won 20 consecutive games.
translation.ja: 20戦 連勝したのです

translation.en: It's hard not to be romantic about baseball.
translation.ja: “人は野球に夢を見る”

translation.en: This kind of thing, it's fun for the fans.
translation.ja: これはファンのためだ

translation.en: It sells tickets and hot dogs.
translation.ja: お陰で チケットも売れるけど―

translation.en: Doesn't mean anything.
translation.ja: 俺には意味がない

translation.en: Billy, we just won 20 games in a row.
translation.ja: 僕らは20連勝した

translation.en: And what's the point?
translation.ja: だから？

translation.en: We just got the record.
translation.ja: 記録を作った

translation.en: Man, I've been doing this for....
translation.ja: 俺はこの世界に…

translation.en: Listen, man. I've been in this game a long time.
translation.ja: いいか　俺はこの世界に ずっといる

translation.en: I'm not in it for a record, I'll tell you that.
translation.ja: 目的は記録ではない

translation.en: I'm not in it for a ring.
translation.ja: 優勝指輪でもない

translation.en: That's when people get hurt.
translation.ja: そんな物はいい

translation.en: If we don't win the last game of the Series... ...they'll dismiss us.
translation.ja: 最後に勝たなければ 何の意味もない

translation.en: -Billy-- -I know these guys. I know the way they think, and they will erase us.
translation.ja: 我々のことなど すぐに忘れられる

translation.en: And everything we've done here... ...none of it'll matter.
translation.ja: 今までのことなど 何も関係ない

translation.en: Any other team wins the World Series, good for them.
translation.ja: 皆 ワールドシリーズを狙う

translation.en: They're drinking champagne, they get a ring.
translation.ja: 勝てばシャンパンに指輪

translation.en: But if we win... ...on our budget, with this team...
translation.ja: だが我々が この予算で勝てば―

translation.en: ...we'll have changed the game.
translation.ja: 世界が変わる

translation.en: And that's what I want.
translation.ja: それが望みだ

translation.en: I want it to mean something.
translation.ja: そこに意味がある

translation.en: The A's going to the play-offs with the West Division title.
translation.ja: いよいよプレーオフです いよいよプレーオフです ２００２年 地区優勝決定戦

translation.en: Forgive the A's if they're not celebrating.
translation.ja: ２００２年 地区優勝決定戦 アスレチックスはまだ 祝い気分はありません アスレチックスはまだ 祝い気分はありません

translation.en: They have been here before...
translation.ja: アスレチックスはまだ 祝い気分はありません

translation.en: ...when Oakland went up two games to none on the Yanks in the ALDS...
translation.ja: 去年のヤンキース戦 ２勝０敗で先行しながら―

translation.en: ...and went nowhere after losing three straight.
translation.ja: その後３連敗で負けました

translation.en: With a win today over the Twins, Oakland moves into the ALCS...
translation.ja: 今日のツインズ戦に勝てば リーグ優勝決定戦に進出です

translation.en: -...for the first time since 1992. -But remember one thing.
translation.ja: 今日のツインズ戦に勝てば リーグ優勝決定戦に進出です せっかくの―

translation.en: Percentages hold up over a season, but for one game, one at bat...
translation.ja: ９回裏 シーズンを通して作った 記録も ９回裏 ９回裏 たったの１打で すべてがフイになる たったの１打で すべてがフイになる

translation.en: ...throw the percentages out the window.
translation.ja: たったの１打で すべてがフイになる

translation.en: What the Minnesota Twins exposed is the fact that the Oakland A's...
translation.ja: ツインズが証明しました アスレチックスは根本的に 健全なチームではない

translation.en: ...were fundamentally not a sound baseball team.
translation.ja: アスレチックスは根本的に 健全なチームではない

translation.en: They had a flawed concept that started with the general manager...
translation.ja: あのＧＭとアシスタントは 間違った考え方で―

translation.en: ...and the brain trust thinking they could reinvent baseball.
translation.ja: あのＧＭとアシスタントは 間違った考え方で― 球界を作り直そうとした

translation.en: You can't approach baseball... ...from a statistical, bean-counting point of view.
translation.ja: 野球を統計で分析するなんて ムリだ

translation.en: It's won on the field with fundamental play.
translation.ja: 個々のプレーの積み重ねです

translation.en: You have to steal, you have to bunt, you have to sacrifice.
translation.ja: 盗塁やバントや 犠牲フライで―

translation.en: You gotta get men in scoring position, and you gotta bring them in.
translation.ja: 走者を塁に出し 本塁へ戻すのです

translation.en: And you don't do that with a bunch of statistical gimmicks.
translation.ja: それは統計などという 奇策ではできない

translation.en: Nobody reinvents this game.
translation.ja: 野球は変えられない

translation.en: Due respect to the Coliseum, but this is a ballpark.
translation.ja: “コロシアム”も悪くないが これこそ球場だよ

translation.en: Yes, it is.
translation.ja: まさしく

translation.en: We're gonna have some lunch in a little bit. Why don't I have some coffee sent up?
translation.ja: ランチの前に コーヒーを飲みたいね

translation.en: Denise?
translation.ja: デニース

translation.en: Thank you, Denise.
translation.ja: ご苦労さま

translation.en: You know, it's her birthday and I need to get her a present...
translation.ja: 今日は彼女の誕生日だ プレゼントをしてやりたいが いつも される方でね

translation.en: ...but she's usually the one that does that for me.
translation.ja: プレゼントをしてやりたいが いつも される方でね

translation.en: So do you have any ideas?
translation.ja: 何がいいかな？

translation.en: Scarf.
translation.ja: スカーフ

translation.en: You mean like wool?
translation.ja: ウールの？

translation.en: No, I meant what women wear with.... You know, decorative.
translation.ja: いや　女性が着飾る おしゃれなやつ

translation.en: And where would I get something like that?
translation.ja: どこに行けばある？

translation.en: No disrespect, I just lost in five for the second year in a row. Get her a bowling ball for all I care.
translation.ja: ２年続けて５戦目で負けた プレゼントなどお好きに

translation.en: Well, Steve told me he's offering you a new contract.
translation.ja: 球団は契約を続けたいと？

translation.en: So why did you return my call?
translation.ja: なぜ私の電話に返事を？

translation.en: Because it's the Red Sox.
translation.ja: レッドソックスだから

translation.en: Because I believe science might offer an answer to the Curse of the Bambino.
translation.ja: “ベーブ･ルースの呪い”を 科学で解けるかと

translation.en: -Because I hear you hired Bill James. -Yup.
translation.ja: それに ビル･ジェイムズを 雇ったと

translation.en: You know, why someone took so long to hire that guy is beyond me.
translation.ja: なぜ みんな彼を 雇わなかったか不思議だね

translation.en: Well, baseball hates him.
translation.ja: 球界は嫌ってる

translation.en: Well, baseball can hate him, you know.
translation.ja: 勝手に嫌えばいい

translation.en: One of the great things about money is that it buys a lot of things...
translation.ja: 金があるといいのは 好きなものが買える

translation.en: ...one of which is the luxury to disregard what baseball likes...
translation.ja: 球界が 誰を好こうと 嫌おうと―

translation.en: ...doesn't like, what baseball thinks, doesn't think.
translation.ja: 私は気にしない

translation.en: Sounds nice.
translation.ja: 面白い

translation.en: Well, I was grateful for the call.
translation.ja: 電話は嬉しかった

translation.en: -You were grateful? -Yeah.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: For 41 million, you built a play-off team.
translation.ja: 君は4100万ドルで 決勝進出チームを作った

translation.en: You lost Damon, Giambi, Isringhausen, Peña...
translation.ja: デーモン　ジオンビ ペーニャを手放して―

translation.en: ...and you won more games without them than you did with them.
translation.ja: 彼らがいたときよりも 多く勝った

translation.en: You won the exact same number of games that the Yankees won...
translation.ja: 勝ち試合数は ヤンキースと同じ

translation.en: ...but the Yankees spent 1.4 million per win...
translation.ja: 彼らは１勝あたり 140万ドルを使い―

translation.en: ...and you paid 260,000.
translation.ja: 君は26万ドル使っただけだ

translation.en: I know you're taking it in the teeth, but the first guy through the wall...
translation.ja: 君も いろいろ言われたろ だが最初に何か成す者は 叩かれる

translation.en: ...he always gets bloody.
translation.ja: だが最初に何か成す者は 叩かれる

translation.en: Always. This is threatening not just a way of doing business...
translation.ja: 常にだ 皆 これが球界の 脅威だと思ってるが―

translation.en: ...but in their minds, it's threatening the game.
translation.ja: 皆 これが球界の 脅威だと思ってるが―

translation.en: Really, what it's threatening is their livelihood, their jobs.
translation.ja: 実は 彼らの 仕事が脅かされている

translation.en: It's threatening the way that they do things.
translation.ja: 自分らの生活がだ

translation.en: Every time that happens... ...whether it's a government, a way of doing business, whatever...
translation.ja: それは政治もビジネスも 皆 同じだ

translation.en: ...the people who are holding the reins... ...they have their hands on the switch...
translation.ja: そこを支配してる者 既成の権力は―

translation.en: ...they go batshit crazy.
translation.ja: みんな頭にくる

translation.en: I mean, anybody who's not tearing their team down right now...
translation.ja: だが皆 今のチームを解体し―

translation.en: ...and rebuilding it using your model... ...they're dinosaurs.
translation.ja: 君の方法で作り直さねば 過去の遺物になる

translation.en: They'll be sitting on their ass on the sofa in October...
translation.ja: そんな奴らは家にこもって 10月に―

translation.en: ...watching the Boston Red Sox win the World Series.
translation.ja: うちの優勝を見てるだろう

translation.en: What's this?
translation.ja: 何です？

translation.en: I want you to be my general manager. That's my offer.
translation.ja: うちのＧＭに　契約額だ

translation.en: Heads up.
translation.ja: 危ない！

translation.en: What was that?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: -Sorry. I don't know. -What the hell was that?
translation.ja: ごめん 何だよ

translation.en: You knucklehead.
translation.ja: まったく

translation.en: How was Boston?
translation.ja: ボストンは？

translation.en: Impressive.
translation.ja: 驚いた

translation.en: Did Henry make you a good offer, at least?
translation.ja: いいオファーが？

translation.en: -Doesn't matter. Doesn't matter. -What was it? What was it?
translation.ja: 関係ない どんな？ 関係ない

translation.en: -Doesn't matter. -What was it?
translation.ja: 言えよ

translation.en: That makes you the highest-paid GM in the history of sports.
translation.ja: スポーツ史上最高額のＧＭだ

translation.en: So?
translation.ja: だから？

translation.en: So what?
translation.ja: 何だ

translation.en: I made one decision in my life based on money. And I swore I would never do it again.
translation.ja: 人生を金で決めたことがある だが もうしないと誓った

translation.en: You're not doing it for the money.
translation.ja: 金は求めてない

translation.en: -No? -No.
translation.ja: 俺が？ ああ

translation.en: You're doing it for what the money says. And it says what it says to any player that makes big money.
translation.ja: この金額が示す価値に 本当の意味がある

translation.en: That they're worth it.
translation.ja: 最高額だ

translation.en: What a dump.
translation.ja: ひどい部屋だな

translation.en: I really wanted to win here.
translation.ja: ここで勝ちたかった

translation.en: I really did.
translation.ja: 心から

translation.en: I think you won pretty big, Billy.
translation.ja: 立派に勝った

translation.en: Pete, we lost.
translation.ja: 俺たちは負けた

translation.en: We lost.
translation.ja: 負けた

translation.en: It's only been a few days. Give yourself some time to get over it.
translation.ja: しばらくすれば忘れる

translation.en: Man, I don't get over these things. Ever.
translation.ja: 俺は忘れない 決して

translation.en: Come with me to the video room. I wanna show you something.
translation.ja: ビデオ室へ 見せたいものがある

translation.en: No, man, I'm not up for film right now.
translation.ja: 何も見たい気分じゃない

translation.en: Come on. Seriously.
translation.ja: 来て　マジだ

translation.en: Come on, Billy. Come on.
translation.ja: さあ　ビリー

translation.en: The Visalia Oaks... ...and our 240-pound catcher, Jeremy Brown...
translation.ja: マイナーの 体重108キロの捕手ブラウン

translation.en: ...who, as you know, is scared to run to second base.
translation.ja: 彼は２塁に走るのを 怖がってる

translation.en: This was in a game six weeks ago.
translation.ja: これは６週間前の試合

translation.en: This guy's gonna start with a fastball. Jeremy's gonna take him to deep center.
translation.ja: ピッチャーの速球を ブラウン センター奥へ

translation.en: Here's what's interesting...
translation.ja: ここから面白い

translation.en: ...because Jeremy's gonna do what he never does.
translation.ja: ありえないことが起きる

translation.en: He's gonna go for it. He's gonna round first and he's gonna go for it.
translation.ja: 彼は走るつもりだった １塁を回って…

translation.en: This is all of Jeremy's nightmares coming to life.
translation.ja: だがブラウンの悪夢が 現実になった

translation.en: -They're laughing at him. -And Jeremy's about to find out why.
translation.ja: みんな笑ってる 理由が面白い

translation.en: Jeremy's about to realize...
translation.ja: ブラウンのボールは―

translation.en: ...that the ball went 60 feet over the fence.
translation.ja: フェンスを大きく越えてた

translation.en: He hit a home run and didn't even realize it.
translation.ja: ホームランだ 彼は知らなかった

translation.en: How can you not be romantic about baseball?
translation.ja: “人は野球に夢を見る”か

translation.en: -It's a metaphor. -I know it's a metaphor.
translation.ja: これと同じだ そうだな

translation.en: Pete, you're a good egg.
translation.ja: ピーター　君はいい奴だ

translation.en: I'll call you.
translation.ja: 電話する

translation.en: Hey, Dad, this is the song I told you I'd record.
translation.ja: これがパパのために 作ったＣＤ

translation.en: Please don't show it to anyone else.
translation.ja: 人には聴かせないでね

translation.en: Let me know if you change your mind and stay in California.
translation.ja: ここに残る気になったら 教えて

translation.en: If not, you're a really great dad.
translation.ja: パパは 本当にステキ

translation.en: I'm just a little bit caught in the middle Life is a maze and love is a riddle
translation.ja: 今 困ってるの 　　人生は迷路　恋は謎々

translation.en: I don't know where to go Can't do it alone, I've tried And I don't know why
translation.ja: どうしよう　一人ではムリ 　　　　　　やってはみたけど

translation.en: I'm just a little girl lost in the moment I'm so scared, but I don't show it
translation.ja: わたしは 戸惑う女の子 　　　　怖いけど 澄まし顔

translation.en: I can't figure it out It's bringing me down
translation.ja: 答えが見えない 　　それって落ち込む

translation.en: I know I've got to let it go
translation.ja: 答えが見えない 　　それって落ち込む でも そんなの忘れよう 　　 　　　そして楽しもう

translation.en: And just enjoy the show
translation.ja: でも そんなの忘れよう 　　 　　　そして楽しもう

translation.en: Slow it down, make it stop Or else my heart is going to pop
translation.ja: ゆっくり　止まって 　　　心臓がはじけそう

translation.en: 'Cause it's too much Yeah, it's a lot To be something I'm not
translation.ja: だってムリ　これ以上 　　　違う人のフリなんて

translation.en: I'm a fool, out of love And I just can't get enough
translation.ja: 愛の枯れたオバカさん 　　　　　　まだ迷ってる

translation.en: And I don't know why
translation.ja: ビリーはレッドソックスの 1250万ドルものオファーを断り―

translation.en: You're such a loser, Dad You're such a loser, Dad
translation.ja: パパはオバカね パパはオバカ…

translation.en: You're such a loser, Dad
translation.ja: パパはオバカ…

translation.en: Just enjoy the show
translation.ja: もっと“野球”を楽しんで
